name: Blocky (itch) (DouglasZA)
description:
Whether you are bored or just want a 2D game to play Blocky is here for you. It is a 2D Platformer made in Godot with basic shapes.


Things to know before playing :

The game is currently in Beta and in Early Access  
Only supports Windows and Mac
No sound effects
10  Levels
There is Discord RPC in the game

Controls

W or Spacebar (for jumping)

A (to go left)

D (to go right)

The game was  inspired by GDQuest: https://www.youtube.com/c/Gdquest
